title: NHSRC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Senior Consultant Posts
description: The National Health System Resource Centre (NHSRC)has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Consultant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS  Post-Graduation can grab this chance and apply for the NHSRC Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and hw to apply online for these posts. Interested candidates can apply online before the last date of applicati...
